attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in PM Boris Johnson.
attributes.additional_details: This Prime Minister is not acting in the best interests of our country, or the people. He has not handled Covid-19 in a balanced, fair way at all. We have endured two national lockdowns, with the threat of more to come. If a lockdown worked - then why do we need another one? The residents of this once great nation have been treated like children, constantly told we have been 'misbehaving' or 'not sticking to the rules.' Government is meant to exist in order to serve the people. Enough is enough!
attributes.background:
Take a vote of no confidence in our Prime Minister, Boris Johnson. 
All MP's to have a vote on whether or not the PM is doing the job to the best of his ability, or in the best interests of our country and people.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
